item.title: jupyter notebook配置
item.description: 远端jupyter notebook的配置 python下载 这里使用anaconda wget https://repo.anaconda.com/archive/Anaconda3-2020.02-Linux-x86_64.sh ./Anaconda3-2020.02-Linux-x86_64.sh 并一直yes，安装anaconda jupyter notebook配
